g.text: Shows to the Administrator a list of pharmacies and asks him to choose the one he wants remove a scooter.
Selects the Pharmacy he wants remove a scooter.
Shows to the Administrator a list of scooters and asks him to choose the one he wants remove.
Selects the scooter he wants remove.
Displays the data, requesting confirmation to remove the scooter.
Informs about the success of the operation
